item.name: Anub'ar Ambusher
item.text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Rogue Class Challenge in Naxxramas.
item.flavor: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Rogue Class Challenge in Naxxramas.

item.name: Avenge
item.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Paladin Class Challenge in Naxxramas.
item.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force." Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Paladin Class Challenge in Naxxramas.

item.name: Baron Rivendare
item.text: Your minions trigger their Deathrattles twice.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Military Quarter.
item.flavor: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Military Quarter.

item.name: Chains
item.text: Hero Power Take control of a random enemy minion.

item.name: Chains
item.text: Hero Power Take control of a random enemy minion until end of turn.
Increased stats.
item.name: Consume
Dancing Swords
item.text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws a card.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Instructor Razuvious in the Military Quarter.
item.flavor: They like to dance to reggae.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Instructor Razuvious in the Military Quarter.

item.name: Dark Cultist
item.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Priest Class Challenge in Naxxramas.
item.flavor: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Priest Class Challenge in Naxxramas.

item.text: Increased stats.
item.name: Darkness Calls
Death's Bite
item.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Warrior Class Challenge in Naxxramas.
item.flavor: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Warrior Class Challenge in Naxxramas.

item.name: Deathbloom
item.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Summon a Spore.

item.name: Deathcharger
item.text: Charge. Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to your hero.

item.name: Deathlord
item.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Your opponent puts a minion from their deck into the battlefield.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating The Four Horsemen in the Military Quarter.
item.flavor: "Rise from your grave!" - Kel'Thuzad
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating The Four Horsemen in the Military Quarter.

item.text: Health changed to 1.
item.name: Decimate
Decimate
item.text: Hero Power Change the Health of all minions to 1.

item.name: Decimate
item.text: Hero Power Change the Health of enemy minions to 1.

item.name: Duplicate
item.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Mage Class Challenge in Naxxramas.
item.flavor: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Mage Class Challenge in Naxxramas.

item.name: Echoing Ooze
item.text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Sapphiron in the Frostwyrm Lair.
item.flavor: OOZE... Ooze... Ooze... (ooze...)
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Sapphiron in the Frostwyrm Lair.

item.text: +6 Attack this turn.

item.text: Give your hero +6 Attack this turn.

item.text: Hero Power Deal 2 damage to the left-most enemy minion.

Feugen

item.name: Kel'Thuzad
item.text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating every boss in Naxxramas!
item.flavor: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating every boss in Naxxramas!

item.name: Loatheb
item.text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by completing the Plague Quarter.
item.flavor: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast. This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after completing the Plague Quarter.

item.name: Locust Swarm
item.text: Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #3 Health to your hero.

item.name: Mad Scientist
item.text: Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
item.howtoget: Unlocked by defeating Grobbulus in the Construct Quarter.
item.flavor: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.
item.howtogetgold: Can be crafted after defeating Grobbulus in the Construct Quarter.

item.name: Maexxna

item.flavor: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".
